result.title: The bad contest time
result.content:
Today I am here to talk about the bad contest time.

These days contests are usually held in weekdays or Sunday afternoon(in Moscow),and in others countries like China, it is about midnight. (For example Codeforces Round #479 (Div. 3) is held on Sunday 22:05 UTF+8)

I am a student from China, I have to go to school early in weekdays. But if you set the contest time at weekday afternoons or Sunday afternoons, I can't take part in them because they are too late in China and if I join, I will feel sleepy the next day.

The only thing I want to suggest is that could you please hold the contest on Saturdays , I think people won't work or go to school on Sundays so that they can join together, at least in China. thx
